Your favorite running and activity tracking app just upped it's game!

- Improved app performance

Love Runtastic? Our goal is to help you improve your fitness and encourage healthy living. Rate us & tell others about your experience in the App Store.

- NEW Story Run: Get moving with "Running for Results" and make your interval runs better than ever!

- Shoe Tracking: Keep track of the mileage on your running shoes! Stay safe and injury-free while keeping your feet happy with Shoe Tracking. All you have to do is add your shoe. We’ll track the mileage and let you know when it’s time to retire your running shoes for a new pair

Love Runtastic ? Rate us with 5 stars & tell others about your experience in the App Store.

Oh, yeah! Your favorite running and activity tracking app just upped it's game!

- Siri integration: Start and control your fitness activities easily with your helpful friend Siri.
- iMessage sharing: Share your success with your friends via iMessage.
- Widget and Rich Notifications: The widget now provides you with some key insights from your last month’s activities. Expanding the widget immediately shows you more detailed monthly statistics. In addition to providing you with a short description of your activity throughout the week, you can now expand the notification for full weekly statistics.
- Update for watchOS 3: We have redesigned the Apple Watch experience!


Love Runtastic? Rate us with 5 stars & tell others why we’re your favorite running app!

- Want to start a little friendly competition with a neighboring country? You can check out Challenge progress using the Country Leaderboard and get motivated to move your homeland up the list!

- Saw something strange in your after activity stats? Forgot to add your shoe to your last workout? No problem — you can fix all that in the edit activity screen!

Need more motivation to get moving? Then join our Run For The Oceans Challenge! For every km you run, $1 will be contributed to fighting marine plastic pollution. 

Is there more new stuff, you ask? You bet! Tracking your challenge participation (or any activity for that matter) is even easier because you can now sync your Polar device and your Runtastic account. 

Speaking of good news for smartwatch wearers, you can now control your music directly in the app on your Apple Watch — how cool!

- You can now easily register and / or login with your Google account :) 

- You've got a friend named "John Smith” or "Emma Davis”, but with such common names, you're having trouble finding them in the app? You can now search for your friends using their email — this way you can be sure you add the John Smith or Emma Davis that you really know.

Bye, Bye Runtastic PRO
This is the last update for the Runtastic PRO app. No worries though! Just switch over to the free version of the Runtastic app. 
Use the same login and all your training history will be there + your already purchased PRO features! 

Got a question for us? We've got an answer at help.runtastic.com!

Bye, Bye Runtastic PRO
This is the last update for the Runtastic PRO app. No worries though! Just switch over to the free version of the Runtastic app. 
Use the same login and all your training history will be there + your already purchased PRO features! 

Got a question for us? We've got an answer at help.runtastic.com!
